name: APILogic
description: APILogic is a meta-script and part of the Meta-Toolbox. APILogic provides chat input logical constructs for shaping the command line, including IF, ELSEIF, and ELSE. It provides a way to define terms for text-replacment operations, or to name condition sets to re-use later in the logical processing. For more information, see the original API forum thread:[APILogic Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/9771314/script-apilogic-gives-if-slash-elseif-slash-else-processing-to-other-scripts/)Or read about the full set of meta-scripts available: [Meta Toolbox Forum Thread](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/10005695/script-set-the-meta-toolbox)
